task: Give me a concise checklist to scaffold a UI in phases.

plannerResult.raw_task: Give me a concise checklist to scaffold a UI in phases.

subtasks.name: agent-phase-sequencing
subtasks.objective: define 4-6 implementation phases from discovery to polish, each with a clear deliverable and exit criteria

subtasks.name: agent-ui-foundations
subtasks.objective: produce a concise setup checklist for layout structure, component primitives, design tokens, navigation, and data/state boundaries

subtasks.name: agent-quality-gates
subtasks.objective: add per-phase validation checks for accessibility, responsiveness, performance, and release readiness
